channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.description:
Report X-2023081486

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE, DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDER REFERED TO THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET FOR HAZARDS AND FOLLOWED THE ACTION STEPS TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL.

item.title: Report X-2023081892
item.description:
Report X-2023081892

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on the trailer wet. Package was positioned where the arrows on package were pointing to the side instead of straight up. package was isolated and put into a hazardous bin, and sat up with the arrows pointing up. DescribePack: Due to the weight of bottle inside the package against one another, the liquid spilled from the bottle tops of 2 of bottles. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was sat up correctly and put in a hazardous bin

item.title: Report E-2023080579
item.description:
Report E-2023080579

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-02T06:14:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: BESSEMER
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one poly 55 drum of emulsifier plus (un1760 ) had been punctured by a sharp object and had released 15 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023070004
item.description:
Report X-2023070004

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-30T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-01
  • City: Muscle Shoals
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: GBRX 705798 was observed with liquid running down the side of the car and originating from the manway during switching operations. The car was isolated and a contractor called to investigate. Contractor found there was no gasket installed on the manway nozzle nor the manway lid. New manway nozzle gasket was installed and the manway properly secured.
